title: Honor Capsules
body: I love the new honor system and I think it's great they put in a way to reward you to be nice to other people, I really like the honor capsules and I like how you could get a few pretty frequently but here comes the issue, ever since I have gotten honor 5 my honor rewards have gotten WORSE and I am very confused by it, I used to get about 2 keyshards a drop from the honor system every few days, now I only get 1 every week or so. I also haven't gotten one honor capsule drop since I have become honor 5 and it has been about half a month of honor 5. Thank you for reading if you did!

replies.body: Keep in mind that these drops will still only give so much per cycle. For instance, you can still only get a maximum of [**12 key fragments per 4-week cycle**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233). They should be evenly spread throughout, but it sounds like they may have mostly dropped towards the beginning of the period for you.
Thank you for responding! I didn't think of their being a loot limit but now hearing this from you it makes sense.
